Welcome to sports-betting documentation!¶

The sports-betting package provides a set of tools to simplify the processes of downloading historical and fixtures sports betting data, fit various types of models, backtest their performance and get the value bets when fixtures are used.

Getting started¶

Information to install the package and an introduction to the basic terminology and functionality of sports-betting.

Main documentation¶

It contains the user guide with an in-depth description of the sports-betting toolbox and how to use it. It also contains the exact API of all functions and classes, as given in the docstring.

Examples¶

A set of examples illustrating the use of sports-betting. It complements the user guide.

Additional information¶

It contains information for developers on how to install the project and its dependencies as well as test and contribute to sports-betting. It also describes the release history of the project.
